vuex实现 

let Vue;

class Store {
    constructor(options){
        this.$options = options
        // 缓存 muatations 和actions
        this._mutations = options.mutations
        this._actions = options.actions
        this._wrappedGetters = options.getters
        // 设置state为响应式
        // this.state = new Vue({
        //     data: options.state
        // })
        // 设置computed属性
        let computed = {}
        this.getters = {}
        let _this= this
        Object.keys(this._wrappedGetters).forEach( key => {
            // 获取用户自定义的getters
            const fn = _this._wrappedGetters[key]
            computed[key] = function () {
                fn(_this.store)
            }
            // 定义只读属性
            Object.defineProperty(store.getters, key, {
                get: () => store._vm[key]
            })
        })

        // 防止外边直接修改数据
        this._vm = new Vue({
            data: {
                $$store : options.state
            },
            computed
        })
        // commit和dispatch绑定this
        this.commit = this.commit.bind(this)
        this.dispatch = this.dispatch.bind(this)
    }

    get state (){
        return this._vm._data.$$store
    }

    set state (v){
        console.log("不要直接修改")
    }


    commit (type, payload) {
        this._mutations[type] && this._mutations[type](this.state, payload)
    }
    dispatch (type, payload) {
        this._actions[type] && this._actions[type](this, payload)
    }
}

function install(_Vue) {
    Vue = _Vue

    Vue.mixin({
        // Vue实例挂载store
        beforeCreate(){
            if(this.$options.store){
                Vue.prototype.$store = this.$options.store
            }
        }
    })
}

export default {
    Store,
    install
}
